name: Fishing for Pieces of Love
description:
Ned and Zoe Necromancer are deeply in love, but the passion has faded.
They go on a date to rekindle the romance.
During that date, monsters appear and attack Zoe, sending pieces of her into the lake.
Ned must use his fishing skills to put Zoe back together so they can finish their date!


A game for Dredge the Depths jam made by Austin Clark (Lead Designer), Claudio Torres (Lead Programmer), Rodrigo Arias (Composer), Nicholas Acevedo (Sound Design - acevedop.n@gmail.com), and Nicholas Rodriguez (Art/Creative - n.rodriguez6695@gmail.com).
